text: Maganga gagataŵile nsingi wa likumba lyo kusyungula musi gakolochekwe ni maganga ga ndalama. Nsingi waandanda wataŵikwe kwa maganga gamachejeu gagali mpela maganga ga yasipi, ni nsingi waŵili waliji wa maganga ga safilo ni nsingi waatatu wa maganga ga kalikedoni ni nsingi waancheche wa maganga ga sumalidi,
